thread.section_title: Egerton House Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing hotel
thread.title_full: Amazing hotel - Review of Egerton House Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kerry P
title: Amazing hotel
text: My husband and I visited this wonderful hotel to celebrate his birthday and were not disappointed!! From the moment of arrival the team could not do enough for us and we knew we were going to have a fabulous stay! Jacques was particularly welcoming and showed us to our beautiful room which we could not fault! Add to that brilliant service in the bar (my husband definitely enjoyed the famous egerton martini!) and returning from dinner to find our room adorned with rose petals and candles and I don't think the stay could have been any more special!! Thanks to all the team for making our weekend :)
